ApolloSection.Headline: List with facet row and archive filter element

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
The list element is an easy way to collect and display collections of contents on a page. To allow for sorting and filtering on that list, two special formatters can be used additionally. The facet row can filter categories and sort the list on configurable criteria. Furthermore the List Archive filter provides powerful search and filtering mechanisms. It comes with search field, category filter and archive list. If you do not need one of those features, you can simple deactivate it in the settings.

Adding one of those elements to a page is as easy as dropping another list element instance on the site and choosing the corresponding formatter for it to appear. Instantly ready to use!
